attributes.action: Petition the Government to honour the Triple Lock for Pensioners.
attributes.additional_details: Because Pensioners have no Union, no mouthpiece with which to influence public opinion or government decisions. Pensioners will die this winter because of the cost of living and the cost of heating. Unless the Triple Lock is honoured, even more pensioners will die prematurely.
attributes.background: Quite simply to honour the Triple Lock for pensioners. It's no more than pensioners need to survive and no more than we deserve.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625622
